Happy ending?

Wow. Honestly one of the most interesting hentai I've read story-wise. Honestly, I think that the friend is just completely in the wrong here. Like he just doesn't deserve shit with how he treated his homie. You don't just fuck your homie's mom for fun, and expose it to the entire world online. I get that he has kinks and likes fucking people but you just don't fucking do that to your friend. The mom was also just in the wrong here with how she completely chose the friend over her son. If they both loved him so much, they honestly should have treated him better. MC took one for the team by letting his friend live because he doesn't like to hurt his mom. Idk man. They just did him dirty.
He should have killed him there and be done with it, the guy is not trustworthy.

Part of the reason that I both agree and disagree with some comments like the one from billy grim is that yes the mother and friend were in a loving relationship and everyone deserves happiness but I also feel like she should of told the son that she was seeing him. At least it may of not come to as much of a shock. Hate me and this comment for what it’s worth but that’s what I believe.

The MC realized that his mother was in-love and happy with being with his best friend. so he put his own feeling to the side.

He stopped himself from royally fucking up his best friend, simply because that will only make his mom sad.  and the dude loves his too much, so he couldn't take away what made his mom happy, regardless of how he felt on the matter.

his decision to leave was basic the same as  telling both his mom and ex-best friend "Do what yall want, i wont get in your"

even though I hate how everything developed, and i dont like how badly he got hurt from the situation. i respect how he handled it, im sure that i would have killed my friend if i ever found myself in this position
Unexpected vanilla development, any other sotry like this? Where at first glance it's only sex but there are actually feelings?

Juna Juna Juice said that he will write an epilogue to the story so this is not the end. There is also an artist cg version of the story but it's not  on nhentai since this site doesn't host  cg galleries.

This is really good. This story is worth to read even with NTR and some hardcore moments. Art in sex is amazing here. MC was really nice here, acting good later and even fight back. Mother was really ez woman here lol. Ending is what we call "bittersweet" because mother is happy with best friend and we feel bad for MC. It's sad that his mother easy chosen his best friend over her own son. When she told "when he left , i didn't feel sad but...relieved" it was harsh feeling after read it. Well MC just like that decided to runaway, not trying to change her or something, but well his choice... I just wish him the best.
